title: 10 Years gift
body: Hi, i received that icon for gifts what was giving to everyone but i allready owned riot kayle and i didnt received mystery and no rp. Can you help me find yout what happend ? Thanks for answers.

replies.body:
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, we're still sending gifts out. We're sending them out in waves because of how many people we're gifting. 

Let me know if you still don't have the mystery gift by the 23rd.

They say the gifts are still being distributed, but I haven't heard of a single person getting a mystery gift yet. I'm wondering if the distribution is bugged or they're giving out mystery gifts in a different wave and just not telling us.
The gifts are still being distributed, so hang in there. The 23rd is the final day to receive them, so if you don't get it by then, you can submit a support ticket.
I didn't even recieve anything, not even the icon. I already own riot kayle.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
